remarks: If there are 3 non-colinear points, dimension must be 2 or more. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 23-Feb-2020.)
statement:
tglngval.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
tglngval.l $e |- L = ( LineG ` G ) $.
tglngval.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
tglngval.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
tglngval.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. P ) $.
tglngval.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. P ) $.
tgcolg.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. P ) $.
ncoltgdim2.1 $e |- ( ph -> -. ( Z e. ( X L Y ) \/ X = Y ) ) $.
ncoltgdim2 $p |- ( ph -> G TarskiGDim>= 2 ) $.
